DOC.brief_summary: By study , researcher hope learn old adult without cognitive impairment adhere Mediterranean diet .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial Mediterranean Diet Pattern Prevent Cognitive Decline
DOC.detailed_description: Participants give instruction follow study design Mediterranean diet . Participation study last 9 week . Each person ask follow study diet 6 week . During study , participant ask track food eat monitor registered dietitian . Potential participant need locate within KC metro area .
DOC.criteria: Cognitively normal old adult age 65 individual diagnosis MCI AD ( age ) Have study partner , diagnose MCI AD Body mass index ( BMI ) range 20 35 kg/m2 Speak English primary language Serious medical risk Adherence specialize diet regime Already consume Mediterranean diet pattern
